mapper.select: select c.*,d.dept_name as demand_dept_name,u.real_name as contract_manager_name,s.supplier_name as party_b_name from contract as c left join sys_user as u on c.contract_manager=u.user_id left join supplier as s on c.party_b_id=s.supplier_id left join sys_dept as d on c.demand_dept_id=d.dept_id ${ew.sqlSegment}
